page.title: 21Hunmanby Hall School closed
page.content:
Hunmanby Hall finally closed its doors to its pupils in 1991. May of the trees surrounding the Park were felled around this time. The buildings remained unoccupied for several years but were finally redeveloped into luxury flats. The school sports-hall has become a private fitness centre and the park has a private nine-hole golf course.
Contribution by: Blank
